member.name: F:Eyedia.IDPE.Common.RuleSetTypes.Unknown
member.summary: Unknown rule set type, generally prior to initialize

member.name: F:Eyedia.IDPE.Common.RuleSetTypes.PreValidate
member.summary: Once the data set is received, prevalidate rules are applied, generally to the whole data container, duplicate check is the common example

member.name: F:Eyedia.IDPE.Common.RuleSetTypes.RowPreparing
member.summary: Before preparing a row, setting default values can be a good example

member.name: F:Eyedia.IDPE.Common.RuleSetTypes.RowPrepared
member.summary: After parsing the datatypes, the best place to calculate derrived values

member.name: F:Eyedia.IDPE.Common.RuleSetTypes.RowValidate
member.summary: A row can be marked as valid or invalid. Cell values cannot be changed at this stage

member.name: F:Eyedia.IDPE.Common.RuleSetTypes.PostValidate
member.summary: Post valid rules are applied to complete data set

member.name: F:Eyedia.IDPE.Common.RuleSetTypes.SqlPullInit
member.summary: Before pulling Sql query to pull data, these rules will be applied. Best place to set connection string

member.name: F:Eyedia.IDPE.Common.SreKeyTypes.GlobalEventsOnComplete
member.summary: [String] Stores global commands raw string, for more information read GlobalEventsOnComplete

member.summary: [String] SQL server connection string

member.name: F:Eyedia.IDPE.Common.SreKeyTypes.ConnectionStringOracle
member.summary: [String] Oracle connection string

member.summary: [String] SQL CE connection string

member.name: F:Eyedia.IDPE.Common.SreKeyTypes.ConnectionStringDB2iSeries
member.summary: [String] DB2 connection string

member.summary: [String] FTP url

member.summary: [String] FTP user name

member.name: F:Eyedia.IDPE.Common.SreKeyTypes.FtpPassword
member.summary: [String] FTP password

member.name: F:Eyedia.IDPE.Common.SreKeyTypes.FtpPort
member.summary: [Int32] FTP port

member.name: F:Eyedia.IDPE.Common.SreKeyTypes.FtpWatchInterval
member.summary: [String] FTP Watch interval in minutes

member.name: F:Eyedia.IDPE.Common.SreKeyTypes.LocalLocation
member.summary: [String] Local archive folder. SRE sets this internally

member.name: F:Eyedia.IDPE.Common.SreKeyTypes.WatchFilter
member.summary: [String] Watch filter on local file system (e.g - .txt|.csv)

member.name: F:Eyedia.IDPE.Common.SreKeyTypes.OutputFolder
member.summary: [String] Local archive folder. SRE sets this internally

member.name: F:Eyedia.IDPE.Common.SreKeyTypes.LocalArchiveFolder
member.summary: [String] Local archive folder. SRE sets this internally

member.name: F:Eyedia.IDPE.Common.SreKeyTypes.FixedLengthSchema
member.summary: [String] 'Fixed Length' schema

member.name: F:Eyedia.IDPE.Common.SreKeyTypes.FixedLengthHeaderAttribute
member.summary: [String - Name of any associated string type attribute] SRE will be configured to make last line as header in case of map 'Fixed Length', and will map it to the value.

member.name: F:Eyedia.IDPE.Common.SreKeyTypes.FixedLengthFooterAttribute
member.summary: [String - Name of any associated string type attribute] SRE will be configured to make last line as footer in case of map 'Fixed Length', and will map it to the value.

member.name: F:Eyedia.IDPE.Common.SreKeyTypes.SqlQuery
member.summary: [String] Sql query, mostly used when loading mechanism is 'PullSQL'. If if it is not in use @data source, you can use this for any other purpose.

member.name: F:Eyedia.IDPE.Common.SreKeyTypes.Custom
member.summary: [String] Any custom key. If app owner wants to keep some configuration/information in SRE (later to be used in some plug-ins/interfaces).

member.name: F:Eyedia.IDPE.Common.SreKeyTypes.GenerateParametersFromDatabase
member.summary: [Bool] SRE has a mechanism to generate multiple parameters from database. For more information please read 'TODO'. This flag enables/disables this feature.

member.name: F:Eyedia.IDPE.Common.SreKeyTypes.IsFirstRowHeader
member.summary: [Bool] If the first row is header. If this is set in case of zip/rar/tar file, this will get applied to all files in the zip

member.name: F:Eyedia.IDPE.Common.SreKeyTypes.PullSqlReturnType
member.summary: [String - 1 char] When loading mechanism is 'PullSQL', if your SQL query output is directly fed into SRE, this should set as 'D' or if you would like an interface to reprocess the SQL output and then feed into SRE, you will set this as 'I' and also set 'PullSqlInterfaceName'

member.name: F:Eyedia.IDPE.Common.SreKeyTypes.PullSqlInterfaceName
member.summary: [String] When loading mechanism is 'PullSQL', and you would need an interface to process the output of the SQL and feed SRE, which means you set 'PullSqlReturnType = I'

member.name: F:Eyedia.IDPE.Common.SreKeyTypes.PullSqlConnectionString
member.summary: [String] When loading mechanism is 'PullSQL', you define your connection string using this

member.name: F:Eyedia.IDPE.Common.SreKeyTypes.SqlWatchInterval
member.summary: [Int32] SQL Watch interval in minutes

member.name: F:Eyedia.IDPE.Common.SreKeyTypes.FileInterfaceName
member.summary: [String] The full file interface type, which will be used to process individual files (applicable when 'ZipFileConfigType = 1'. This is useful when you have custom data inside the file (for example, xml) and you would need an interface to covert the xml into data table.

member.name: F:Eyedia.IDPE.Common.SreKeyTypes.ZipInterfaceName
member.summary: [String] The full interface type, which will be used to process the zip (applicable when 'ZipFileConfigType = 1'

member.name: F:Eyedia.IDPE.Common.SreKeyTypes.ZipDataFileDataFormatType
member.summary: [DataFormatTypes] Zip data file format

member.name: F:Eyedia.IDPE.Common.SreKeyTypes.ZipFilesSortType
member.summary: [string] -1 = SRE will not sort the files and process as is 0 = SRE will sort the files based on extensions before processing. Ascending 1 = SRE will sort the files based on extensions before processing. Descending ".txt|.dat" = SRE will sort the files based on configured extensions

member.name: F:Eyedia.IDPE.Common.SreKeyTypes.SqlUpdateQueryProcessed
member.summary: [String] Sql update query, used when loading mechanism is 'PullSql'. This query is used to mark data as processed.

member.name: F:Eyedia.IDPE.Common.SreKeyTypes.SpreadSheetNumber
member.summary: [Int] Spread sheet number of a spreadsheet file

member.name: F:Eyedia.IDPE.Common.SreKeyTypes.ZipIgnoreFileList
member.summary: [String] SRE will ignore these types of extensions (e.g - .txt|.dat)

member.name: F:Eyedia.IDPE.Common.SreKeyTypes.ZipIgnoreFileListButCopyToOutputFolder
member.summary: [String] SRE will ignore these types of extensions, but copy the file as is to output folder (e.g - .txt|.dat)

member.name: F:Eyedia.IDPE.Common.SreKeyTypes.ZipFileConfigType_not_in_use
member.summary: [Bool] 0 - simple(default) config, 1 - custom config: all the interfaces are overriden with custom interfaces

member.name: F:Eyedia.IDPE.Common.SreKeyTypes.ZipDoNotCreateAcknoledgementInOutputFolder
member.summary: [Bool] By default zip/tar/rar (e.g: input.zip) a acknoledgement text file will get created in output folder as <file name>.xml (e.g. input.zip.xml) which will contain the unique zip id. This can be used to acknoledge that the file has been processed. If this flag is set to boolean true, the file will not be copied to output folder

member.name: F:Eyedia.IDPE.Common.SreKeyTypes.RenameColumnHeader
member.summary: [Bool] Renames file column names according to associated attribute names

member.name: F:Eyedia.IDPE.Common.SreKeyTypes.DataFeedCustomType
member.summary: [String] Data feed through custom type. An array or single object can be passed directly to ProcessManager.Parse() method

member.name: F:Eyedia.IDPE.Common.SreKeyTypes.LocalFileSystemFoldersOverriden
member.summary: [bool] Whether data source has overriden 'PullLocalFileSystem' folders

member.summary: [String] Pull folder, when data source wants to override 'PullLocalFileSystem'

member.summary: [String] Archive folder, when data source wants to override 'PullLocalFileSystem'

member.summary: [String] Output folder, when data source wants to override 'PullLocalFileSystem'

member.name: F:Eyedia.IDPE.Common.SreKeyTypes.LocalFileSystemFolderArchiveAuto
member.summary: [bool] Whether to create auto archive folder (under pull folder), when data source wants to override 'PullLocalFileSystem'

member.name: F:Eyedia.IDPE.Common.SreKeyTypes.OutputFileExtension
member.summary: [String] Output file extension(visual),example-.txt,.csv,.data,etc.If not defined it will be .xml by default

member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: T:Mask
member.summary: Mask class to provide various utility static helper methods to help most common activities like NullString, EmptyString, SQLDateTime, NullableToGeneric, etc. This class is made partial so that developer can add additional methods in to the same class.

member.name: M:Mask.NullableToGeneric``1(System.Object)
member.summary: Converts Nullable data type to Generic data type

member.name: M:Mask.NullString(System.String)
member.summary: Masks nullable string to empty string, else returns string itself.

member.name: M:Mask.EmptyString(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Fills string with filler if string is NOT null or is NOT empty or string length is NOT 0

member.name: M:Mask.SQLDateTime(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Checks if DateTime is a valid MS SQL DateTime. Returns 1/1/1753 12:00:00 AM if DateTime is equal to 1/1/0001 12:00:00 AM else returns passed DateTime

member.name: M:Mask.SQLDateTime(System.String)
member.summary: Converts strDateTime to valid DateTime. Returns 1/1/1753 12:00:00 AM if strDateTime is equal to 1/1/0001 12:00:00 AM else returns strDateTime

member.name: M:Mask.SQLDateTime
member.summary: Returns valid MS SQL DateTime 1/1/1753 12:00:00 AM
